name: FlightStatus
description: FlightStatus is an example contract which requests data from the Chainlink network. This contract is designed to work on multiple networks, including local test networks.

parameterDecorators.name: _path
parameterDecorators.description: Which data in json needs to get.

parameterDecorators.name: _update
parameterDecorators.description: Wheather needs to update the result.

parameterDecorators.name: _path
parameterDecorators.description: Which data in json needs to get.

parameterDecorators.name: _update
parameterDecorators.description: Wheather needs to update the result.

functionDecorators.name: cancelRequest
functionDecorators.description: Call this method if no response is received within 5 minutes.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID that was generated for the request to cancel.

parameterDecorators.name: _payment
parameterDecorators.description: The payment specified for the request to cancel.

parameterDecorators.name: _callbackFunctionId
parameterDecorators.description: The bytes4 callback function ID specified for the request to cancel.

parameterDecorators.name: _expiration
parameterDecorators.description: The expiration generated for the request to cancel.

functionDecorators.name: fulfill
functionDecorators.description: The fulfill method from requests created by this contract. The recordChainlinkFulfillment protects this function from being called by anyone other than the oracle address that the request was sent to.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: The ID that was generated for the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: The answer provided by the oracle.

functionDecorators.name: getChainlinkToken
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the LINK token. This is the public implementation for chainlinkTokenAddress, which is an internal method of the ChainlinkClient contract.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
